description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans topics like digital fragmentation, ecosystem architecture, and innovative approaches to global challenges. yeehaa's blog posts explore concepts such as internet fragmentation, McLuhan's global village, and Sloterdijk's foam metaphor. His curated courses cover ecosystem grooming, web innovation, and valuing differences, reflecting his commitment to personal growth, creativity, and inclusive dialogue.
